questions.question: Which sentence contains an adverb of frequency?
options: The children play outside every day.
He ran quickly to the store.

questions.question: Which sentence uses the adverb 'never' correctly?
options: He never forgets to call me.
I never am late for work.
They never goes to the gym.
questions.answer: He never forgets to call me.

questions.question: Choose the sentence where the adverb modifies the verb and not the adjective.
options: He is extremely tired after the long run.
They laughed very loudly during the movie.
